title: deps and blast-radius CLI commands
description: CLI commands for dependency discovery and deployment risk analysis. nthlayer deps: show upstream/downstream dependencies with --direction, --format json, --demo options. nthlayer blast-radius: calculate deployment risk with --depth, --format json options. Exit codes: 0 (low risk), 1 (medium risk), 2 (high/critical risk). Files: src/nthlayer/cli/deps.py, blast_radius.py. Tests: tests/test_cli_deps.py, test_cli_blast_radius.py.
